website_summaries.verdict: With its wide wheel and retracting action, this product is  a budget alternative to pricier beginner products.
pros: Durable steel coil provides resistance on the way out and a controlled return
Ergonomic pro-grip handles minimize hand fatigue while maximizing control
cons: Unidirectional, so take care to put hands on the proper handle

customer_reviews.title: Natural and smooth roll. Product comparison.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried 3 of these ab roller-types. 1) this one, 2) the static regular one, 3) the perfect ab carver also with coil return. I don't much like the static rollers as they feel wobbly and I feel like I'm damaging my carpet. This roller has a much more natural and smooth feel to it. This is similar in form and function as the perfect ab carver, except the wheel feels like it's larger in diameter and your hands are closer on this roller. Angling seems even on both rollers. Between the two coil-return rollers, I prefer this one since it's not as bulky or heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Tido

customer_reviews.title: Definitely cuts your abdomen if you can do it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is serious! I could barely move the first week of using it, but I kept going! I try to do one more rep than the last time but it is tough. You MUST be somewhat fit to use as it is NOT for someone with weak upper body strength.
customer_reviews.author: Brenton1985

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend buying a different ab roller wheel
customer_reviews.text: This product did not come with the knee pad as advertised, which I could work around. However, the 2nd time that I used it, the inner spring to "assist" with the return roll broke. The construction of the mechanism is cheap. There are a ton of better options available. I promptly returned this item and received a full refund from Amazon. Thanks Amazon! Then, I purchased a different more sturdy model.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and superior.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product for the price. The resistance is minimal and in actuality unnecessary. If the spring ever failed i would simply use it without it. As long as you use proper form it's perfectly safe and simple to use. Will definitely work you core, not just your abs but your serratus, lats... triceps, forearms shoulders, chest and lower back.
customer_reviews.author: A. Amat

customer_reviews.title: Stronger core in 2 weeks if you stay consistent and eat well.
customer_reviews.text: I always make new friends at the gym with this ab roller ! More than 10 people have asked me where I got this ab roller. I always feel confident recommending others to purchase it. It really does work and I always see a difference when I constantly use it for 1-2 weeks. The spring inside makes it easier to manage but it's an intense exercise for sure! IT'S MY FAVORITE workout accessory. Keep in mind you're not going to have killer abs with a bad diet (eating whatever you see) and using this roller. Food is also important in other to see good results.
customer_reviews.author: Yahima

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners and intermediates!
customer_reviews.text: I had an Ab Slide years ago and didn't like it cuz it was bulky and I couldn't hit my obliques by rolling to the side. This sucker is GREAT! A single wheel w amazing traction and wide, comfortable, rubbery handles for extended use. The single wheel allows you to really dig into your obliques for maximum effort! It does have a inner spring, but the resistance/assistance is minimal. You will feel sore after your first workout... A GOOD sore.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: A good addition to your ab exercises
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely the roller you want. The handles are well made, the wheel is beefy and it's not bad looking as an object to have sitting around the house when not in use. Much better design than the straight and round pipe handle roller kinds. A great additional piece of home gym gear to compliment planks and sit ups.
customer_reviews.author: Creighton Yost

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: This is the first ab roller device that I have purchased, soni can't compare it to anything else. The "assembly" was easy, simply snap the handles in place. The wheel had a nice rubber outer layer, so it won't slip while in use. The curved handles are fairly comfortable, but it might be painful for someone with tendonitis. I'm excited to see my results after regular use.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeAddict

customer_reviews.title: Durable and made of very good quality. The instructional manual comes with exercises of ...
customer_reviews.text: Durable and made of very good quality. The instructional manual comes with exercises of varying degrees of difficulty. This is a tougher workout than I thought as it takes more than just abdominal work, but also a lot of arm and upper body strength (which is, admittedly, my area of weakness).
customer_reviews.author: SewCookMama

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic product and the price was better than I could ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product and the price was better than I could find locally. Does what it says for your abs and you can find great workouts online to use this in different ways.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Retracting distance is always off
customer_reviews.text: It's kind of annoying after 4-5 extensions, it doesn't retract back to the same place where you started. Retraction keeps getting shorter and shorter so you don't get a full motion/movement coming back. I'm having to lift the wheel to create a new set point. I would give it 2.5 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Prince

customer_reviews.title: Spring broke on the inside.
customer_reviews.text: Product broke after a short period of time. The spring mechanism snapped on the inside and no longer works as intended. I would like a refund, but it broke after the return period.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Try it and you'll like it
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. It came with everything it has advertised. you have to assemble this yourself but don't worry it's a 1-2-3 process. i even received a warranty and the guide on how to perform workouts from beginner to advance levels. i have began the beginner workout i can say not only do i feel the burn in my torso but also in my arms.
customer_reviews.author: sixosz hauldi

customer_reviews.title: The spring inside broke after the third use. Could ...
customer_reviews.text: The spring inside broke after the third use. Could not send it back because I had already thrown packaging away.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT T KWI

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money and effort.
customer_reviews.text: I used the original to this ( not the brand) in the 70's and when I saw they had upgraded the product I had to get it again. I ghave started out doing the reps of 10 only and and going three quarters of the way and I can feel the effects already. It is a good product if you do not want to go to a gym but keep your muscles toned as you get older. I have no illusions of looking like a body builder but then I did not when I was in my twenties.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Have been using it for months without ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Have been using it for months without any problems. The spring helps with coming back so this is ideal for beginners and intermediate. Advanced abs would benefit from No spring loaded roller. Either way you're going to get a workout even if you do have advanced abs too. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Who knew

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the minimal investment!
customer_reviews.text: This ab roller works great and feels stable when being used. The ergonomic handles and steel could aid the user in getting full benefits out of these tough but effective exercises. Follow their beginner recommendations and you will see safe improvements in no time.
customer_reviews.author: JBump30

customer_reviews.title: spring loaded takes away most of the resistance
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize it was spring loaded when I bought it (guess that is my fault) but there is just not enough resistance with this thing. I am 42 years old and not in good shape, but still did not feel any soreness after doing three sets of 20 with this. I threw it away and purchased a new ab roller that is not spring loaded and I struggle to get through 3 sets of 15 - I get a much better workout. If you have no conditioning whatsoever, this may be a good first start, but if you have any level of conditioning, I would recommend not purchasing this.
customer_reviews.author: Running love

customer_reviews.title: The roller works perfect, but you can tell it’s cheap
customer_reviews.text: The abs roller works exactly as expected, however you can definitely tell the product it made of super cheap materials. It’s perfect for my usage but beware it feels kinda cheap. I still think it’s a decent product for the low price tag
customer_reviews.author: Peyton

customer_reviews.title: Works but not for me
customer_reviews.text: I can’t fully extend as the internal spring binds up, I’m 6’1”
customer_reviews.author: Chad S.

customer_reviews.title: Inner Spring Misbehaved
customer_reviews.text: Right from the beginning the inner spring did not unwind all the way after each roll back and forth. After a few rolls it would prevent me from rolling all the way back. I threw it in the trash, and got something without a spring.
customer_reviews.author: jtkat

customer_reviews.title: It works, but is wobbly.
customer_reviews.text: You need balance to use this, otherwise it goes out of control. It took me a couple weeks to get used to the motion of this device. But you can fell the effect for sure on your body. It does work.
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: Too much resistance
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, not worth it for the price. You can only roll in one direction which is bizarre and there's far too much resistance in the one direction that you can roll. Far too limiting and no range of motion. Mine also came with scratches so it was definitely used (and what I paid for said it was new). Don't recommend. Better ab rollers out there for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Celia M

customer_reviews.title: Great if you get a working product
customer_reviews.text: My second one of these. Feels like plastic on plastic friction instead of a spring. I know that these are great when they work. I’ve owed 2. One worked well but wore out over years.
customer_reviews.author: Bush

customer_reviews.title: After reading some of the reviews on here, I ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews on here, I decided to purchase this product in the hopes that the mechanism inside would be able to hold up after continuous use. After using the product for several months, I haven't noticed any significant lose of mechanical integrity. I'll continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: a must have
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought 2 of this so I can have one with me in my gym bag and at work and one at home. It's a great tool to help with your daily exercises, I had a few back surgeries and this definitely helps but had to be careful on the form while exercising
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Right handle not snapping in place
customer_reviews.text: Would like to give it 5 stars however the right handle does not securely lock in place. It’s functional but would be nice if bot handles were fully locked in.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it was just me, but I couldn’t get one of the handles to assemble! The locking mechanism was in the wrong spot, so it was impossible to put it together and try it. I could feel the spring back motion when I rolled one side though, pretty nifty.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Ullah

customer_reviews.title: Worked good for about 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Worked good for about 3 weeks, then the assisted bearing broke...... tried returning but of course can not, if the seller could replace I'd give 5 stars till then one star for cheaply made made product and even worse return policy .....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds my weight
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it is supposed to do. I'm a 300 pound guy and I was a little worried about my weight, but I can fully extend and it holds my weight.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: can't compare with similar products. but the whole concept of this product is amazing, arms , abs, glutes, back, shoulders, 1 stop shopping. arms give out first for me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defintely isolates your abs
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. However, I am hearing the spring make grinding sounds and I'm hopeful it will hold up. For $20 bucks, I won't bother with a return. I'm not a big person. If you are, it may not hold up to a lot of pressure or weight. Just my general impression.
customer_reviews.author: Joe F

customer_reviews.title: CRAZY GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I’ve had it for the last couple of months and it’s getting me super ripped. The aid to roll back back up that has it integrated is awesome so it can help you a little bit. The only thing is mine broke right now, I’ve been going crazy with this. I don’t want a refund I just want to see if you guys can replace it with a new one because like mentioned before it’s crazy good!
customer_reviews.author: Treestan Vera

customer_reviews.title: Product worked well for a few weeks....
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well for a few weeks then in the middle of use the internal spring made a sound and it doesn't extend/retract correctly anymore. :(
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Good, but used to be better.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my old model. While it is nice, it is not as smooth as the old design. You can see and feel the slight differences and while it is still a good product, it is not as good as it was.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Slattery

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: It really does work to help flatten and strengthen tummy muscles but you have to be consistent with it. I've been using it everyday 30 rolls in the AM and about 30 in the PM and it has helped. It's literally like 5 min abd Workout. It's kind of fun too! It beats sit ups.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: A gift that actually works!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. It came with instructions indicating the process is a slow and steady one, and to do 'warm up' routines with the wheel and to work up to a level you are comfortable with. Seems to be a great workout tool, and you must follow the warm-up routines for every session. This has a spring inside that tightens as you roll forward and assists your return to the starting position. That is neat!
customer_reviews.author: Lazy eye

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to ab routines!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for just over a month & it's working flawless, no issues to speak of. Keep in mind that this does have a coil & if you are very tall it may not be suitable for you. Maybe better suited for individuals under 5' 10" in height. Other than that, it's pretty solid & targets the right muscles when done properly.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Failed item
customer_reviews.text: Was really looking forward to this item. But it came with two left handed handles and it makes it feel weird hands and while balancing
customer_reviews.author: Richard  Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: its well made and at a reasonable price compared to similar products. It has the spring back feature which is useful when exercising with this. Grips fit my hands well. Works on hard floor or carpet, but I recommend something soft to put under your knees if you are using it on a hard surface.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo the Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: the best ab wheel i ever owned
customer_reviews.text: this is great for me , this sturdy fat wheel is awesome i needed something like this to toughen up my stomach
customer_reviews.author: Michael Noronowicz

customer_reviews.title: Get something else
customer_reviews.text: Very stable, and solid, actually.. too solid... it snags a lot and doesn’t wanna roll in one direction or another out or in. Complete waste
customer_reviews.author: J war

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These things kill me, not sure why I buy them. Really happy that this one doesn’t allow you to go to far forward. I’m always sore the day after using this roller, so it gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Moore

customer_reviews.title: Mine broke after a few weeks of use.
customer_reviews.text: It has a locking mechanism that prevents the device from rolling back on you further than the starting point. It also provides some assistance on the rollback process because a spring winds up when you roll forward. Overall great idea, but the locking mechanism in mine broke so now it doesn't lock at the starting point. The rolling forward process now "ker-chunks" as well now and isn't a smooth roll. The thing still kinda works, I guess, but I'm definitely going to return it due to it's short lifespan.
customer_reviews.author: Erik B.

customer_reviews.title: My abs are worked with this device for sure!
customer_reviews.text: This device actual works! I had to get used to it after the first week, but now on my third week, i'm doing the standup rollouts. I use this ab wheel at least 4x a week...i highly recommend this wheel because its comfortable and it very sturdy, i'm 190 and this wheel supports the max of 300 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality and heavy duty product
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously good quality. The max weight says 300 lb's but this thing is built tough. I'm nearly 400 lb's at the moment and this thing is very solid.
customer_reviews.author: William Mooney

customer_reviews.title: I' ve been using a roller wheel for years and if you want great Ab's this device with work as long as you ...
customer_reviews.text: It works if YOU want to WORK....I' ve been using a roller wheel for years and if you want great Ab's this device with work as long as you watch what you eat and exercise.
customer_reviews.author: MITCHELL SMITH

customer_reviews.title: The Truth
customer_reviews.text: This product is the truth...but only works if you use it! It will break you off in the beginning but don't let the pain deter you. After a few weeks of a strict regime (3-5 sets×10), you will see and feel a significant difference.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Exchange
customer_reviews.text: It's good, until after few times using it, it broke. Amazon doesn't want to change it for me because it's passed 30 days. I didn't expect it'll break in less than a year. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think I can, I think I can
customer_reviews.text: Must work wonders. I can’t get back off the floor after doing one. I imagine it works. I imagine I’m not very motivated. Someday. Until Then, thank god for shapeshifting shapewear.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Gallaway

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very strong feeling that this was someone's return and then shipped to me. Packaging was already opened and pieces did not fit easily together ( manufacturer's defect??) and wheel did not move very smoothly. There was a lot of resistance while using it...received it, put it together and returned it all within a 1 hour time period!
customer_reviews.author: Antonia P.

customer_reviews.title: Worked ok just didn't end up liking or using that much
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like it or use it as often as i thought i would. Also, didn't like the strain it put on my back.
customer_reviews.author: Jkell

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: Maybe will be good for somebody but for me it's not good. The spirol inside just noise and interferes with work
customer_reviews.author: Anton

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Cannot even use it. Tried on several surfaces and the wheel sticks and clicks when going outward and wobbles badly coming back in. I really liked the handles, and wide wheel, but otherwise was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable,
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few years now, and it still works great. Can bring it to the park for any outdoor workout, not too bulky. The little guide it comes with is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: Wheel is making grinding noise after only 3 months of use...
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one works great
customer_reviews.text: This wheel works great really feel the burn in your abdomen the next day and soon after of doing exercise plus this is the best price wheel with a spring return that I can find online I feel it's made very well and I am a 300 pound man it holds me with no problem since I started using product I have lost 20 pounds. Also height is not a problem I am 6'3"
customer_reviews.author: Bigworm420

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works as described and intended. Great product for any gym rat!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Beach abs
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Ab roller. Very stable if you are going to the side. You can really feel your abs working
customer_reviews.author: James P Curran

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 15 year old son and after one year of him using this 3-4 times a week still works perfect no problems
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro I Mata

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it was good while it lasted. The recoil spring snapped and my face met the floor :/
customer_reviews.author: jared evans

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you steady
customer_reviews.text: This works really great compared to the other well known AB wheel on the market that is sold at Walmart. This really helps you be study with the rubber gripped tread.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: went from a keg to a 12 pack in 6 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Fun product/ good for the house
customer_reviews.text: Not for a gen pop gym...fragile...great for single person use at a home gym. Do t leave it at a community gym, will break within the hour
customer_reviews.author: rutledge rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great Home Gym Addition
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to Use. Awesome addition to my home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: this worked great, but it only takes one time of someone ...
customer_reviews.text: this worked great, but it only takes one time of someone rolling it the wrong way to pop the spring on the inside (found out the day I got mine thanks to a good friend) it stil works even broken but it makes constant spring popping noises!
customer_reviews.author: ChiefedOut

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it is comfortable to use and worked well
customer_reviews.text: internal spring coil broke in first 6 moths and now recently one handle broke. So not well built for long lasting. Otherwise it is comfortable to use and worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love this exercise wheel!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the speed Abs Complete workout system, and love it. There is a spring inside the wheel and it works beautifully. Its a great exercise in getting your abs that much more stronger. Absolutey no regrets! I'd buy it again if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: MGM

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The product does not come with Knee pad as shown, othersise okay -
customer_reviews.author: kenneth green

customer_reviews.title: You'll feel it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works. Build quality is solid. Definitely a good add to any home gym. Works best on hard surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Range of motion is bad or something
customer_reviews.text: Am I suppose to hear some kind of metallic sound from the roller. I just unboxed it today and I am hearing stuff, it hardly rolls back and forth without some kind of resistance with a crackling sounds. I am confused weather to return it or not I really need the equipment ASAP so I guess I might keep it
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Works a lot of muscles -
customer_reviews.text: Great workout - feels better than the one at my gym.
customer_reviews.author: Asura

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! The picture showed knee pad that does ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! The picture showed knee pad that does not come with it. The roller itself is awesome and the spring roll back adds extra support without taking away from your workout. Results are produced quickly with even little use. I use once a day for 2 minutes and can see a different.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Speed Abs Complete Ab Workout System by Iron Gym, Abdominal Roller Wheel
customer_reviews.text: It does what it suppose to do. at least 100 reps, next day you'll feel it. Thanks Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Hard at first. You need a knee pad. But this thing works. You feel your abs aching at the start.
customer_reviews.author: seema

customer_reviews.title: Broke after limited use.
customer_reviews.text: I'm within the weight requirements and has using the Speed Abs properly, but after 5-10 some internal piece of plastic broke. Now it rattles and doesn't roll comfortably. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CKoontz

customer_reviews.title: Junky material
customer_reviews.text: Was desperately looking for an abs roller and came across this one... overall not too pleased. The material feels junky and not well made. Makes weird noises and isn’t smooth. One of the handles was delivered bent and was very hard to assemble. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: David Dahan

customer_reviews.title: Durable, great price, and effective
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly how it describes above. It came early for me, arrived ahead of schedule, was in secure and compact packaging. It has with it the instruction manual, which has workout suggestions and assembly instructions. This product has had a positive impact on my core workouts and is easy to use and understand. I highly recommend this product for anyone with time constraints and for anyone who likes to workout at home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wobble wobble
customer_reviews.text: The handles are wobbly and I feel like every time I use them I’m going to bend them or they’re going to snap
customer_reviews.author: Richard Quinones

customer_reviews.title: Painfull (In a Good Way)
customer_reviews.text: This is very mean to me and my abs hurt! That's probably the best review I can give a product like this. Make sure you learn how to use it correctly! I had some back pain at first because I wasn't keeping my spine straight while using the roller.
customer_reviews.author: MXER 7

customer_reviews.title: Great product, at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Great product I have the original an wheel that was twice as much as this and this is actually just as good. I use it everyday
customer_reviews.author: victor

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good ab wheel, after much prolonged use the return spring became a little clunky but still works well
customer_reviews.author: Specialty Motorsports

customer_reviews.title: Better Than The Perfect Ab Wheel
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this speed ab wheel and the perfect ab wheel. I like this one better because it’s lighter, it works better on hard floors too. I notice with my perfect ab wheel it would scratch it up. Not with this thing tho.
customer_reviews.author: Survival

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t receive the correct product parts, can’t use.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, but I can’t use it because the box came with two left handles instead of one left handle and one right handle. I’ve read other reviews that say the product was damaged upon arrival. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Julie F.

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: The width of the wheel is perfect. Although they are detachable, the handles feel solid and make the whole thing very portable. Minus one star because I don't feel confident that the spring mechanism will last in the long term.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Brooke after just a few uses
customer_reviews.text: The internal spring broke on the first day I used it. It kind of still works but the spring inside slips when you roll out just a short distance so you can't get full extension any more
customer_reviews.author: Tech Guy

customer_reviews.title: For weak people
customer_reviews.text: horrible for really weak people I don't consider myself strong but my 4 yr old son can do about 5 reps on this on his knees
customer_reviews.author: John Kim

customer_reviews.title: Tough made product
customer_reviews.text: Very well made device, ergonomic handle with real rubber wheel. Never realized how tough ab workouts are until I tried it!
customer_reviews.author: Ecto

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy coil inside
customer_reviews.text: The exterior is fine. Handles are good compared another product I have but costs only $10. The wheel makes noise due to the flimsy coil inside and the wheel itself is not very solid.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Bad for abs
customer_reviews.text: Spring broke after just two weeks of light usage. I will be switching over to a non-spring roller this time around. 👎👎👎👎👎 I’m 130 lbs so it couldn’t be my weight that broke it. I don’t recommend abs rollers without spring, in fact, after using one with the spring I actually feel it takes away half the effort that really helps your abs to work hard. I do normal sit-ups often so this roller did not put any stress on my abs at all, but mainly just shoulders and back and I think the spring that causes the retrieving is the reason. I’ve tried non-spring ones before in a gym and I recall feeling my abs after the quick workout.
customer_reviews.author: ThaGoodGuy18

customer_reviews.title: Workout while watching tv
customer_reviews.text: It does offer a workout. It's my first ab wheel so I can't compare it to others but I can compare it to crunches and it offers the same workout with less time spent. It doesn't come with a kneel pad fyi.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: The way it is designed does not give a good workout.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will get a solid six pack in no time.
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the item, works great I use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Sam morales

customer_reviews.title: Cool Product
customer_reviews.text: I have received item in a great timely manner. I have been using this product and I tell you, for me it works great. I can tell when my abs, arms and back is feeling the results. At first it was mainly adjusting to it, now I include this in my workout regime. Cool product...
customer_reviews.author: Roslyn

customer_reviews.title: does not feel like it's going to fall apart
customer_reviews.text: This actually works, I can feel the soreness the day after. Product is solid, does not feel like it's going to fall apart. The key is technique/form - there are some youtube vids that demonstrate how to obtain proper form using an 'ab roller' like this one. I found this one most helpful:
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: The only reason I gave this 4 stars is because there seems to be a limit to how far you can roll this out before it feels like t
customer_reviews.text: Works well, the handles are very ergonomic. The only reason I gave this 4 stars is because there seems to be a limit to how far you can roll this out before it feels like the mechanism inside is being strained.
customer_reviews.author: MegV

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful exercise wheel
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I want to buy again, but the price was much more expensive than I bought, I bought in December 2018 for $ 17.86. Now it is sold at a very expensive price. I'll take it again when it's an affordable price !!!
customer_reviews.author: Dwoyt

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new little gadget that works wonders IF I use it :))
customer_reviews.author: bU

customer_reviews.title: quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this thing. A really good, quick work out. I can definitely see and feel results in my abs and arms. I do about 10 reps a couple times a day (usually right before and after I go for a run. it's working well!
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Feels kind of cheap but it is strong and is ...
customer_reviews.text: Feels kind of cheap but it is strong and is still holding up months later! It is one crazy hard workout too!
customer_reviews.author: Billy

product_meta.title: Iron Gym IRG013 Speed Abs Complete Ab Workout System, Abdominal Roller Wheel, 9.4 x 3.6 x 7.9, Black/Red
product_meta.description: Speed Abs by Iron Gym is the only ab machine that provides superior resistance (as you roll out) and assistance (as you roll in) while you sculpt, tone, and strengthen your whole upper body. Its' pro-grip handles are a special high performance ergonomic, rubberized design that helps minimize hand fatigue by keeping you in your natural position to prevent slippage while maximizing stability, control and comfort so you can optimize your abdominal workout and go for longer! The durable, ultra wide non-skid ab exercise wheel with built-in steel coil provides enhanced resistance as you extend and roll out to take your abdominal exercises to the extreme, then helps guide and assist you back in a fluid, controlled manner so you really feel the burn! Strengthen and tone your upper abs, lower abs, oblique's and entire core! Get chiseled shoulders, shredded arms and your V-shape back with the Speed Abs exercise wheel by Iron Gym Durable Ultra wide non-skid wheel Ab machine features durable steel coil to provide resistance on the way out and a controlled return Rubberized pro-grip handles to minimize hand fatigue while maximizing control and comfort Supercharge your metabolism! Appropriate for all fitness levels, beginner to advanced Use Speed Abs on any floor surface and to get the most out of your abdominal exercise routine Imported Shipping Note: Shipping to Alaska, Hawaii, PO Boxes, and APO addresses is not available for this item
